title: A word to Riot/League devs
body:
Would just like to take this opportunity to say,



You can put shiny things you put on the main screen of the client, you can host big amazing events with crazy light shows and have attractive hosts who say cool things. You can say how cool the "new champ" or "new meta" is going to be or whatever else you'd likely come out with.

Ultimately, you can put lipstick on a pig..

Successfully ruining the game over and over has made it easy to quit. You've shunned big names in the community and you are now a purely profit based company with no real intention of trying to bring something great to your customers. 

Congratulations, you ruined a once great game for money.
